How many people are affected by lattice corneal dystrophy type I ?,"Lattice corneal dystrophy type I is one of the most common disorders in a group of conditions that are characterized by protein deposits in the cornea (corneal dystrophies); however, it is still a rare condition. The prevalence of lattice corneal dystrophy type I is unknown.",GHR,lattice corneal dy
